title: Nebule
creator_credit: Rene Jodoin, ONF | NFB and Bernard Longpre
brief_description: In this animated film a black line becomes a magic cord to serve a small child’s fancy. In Nebule’s hands it becomes whatever he wills and the metamorphoses, played out against a soft, pastelcolored background, encompass the world of a child’s fears and fancies. A film without narration.
